description: Detects Task Scheduler .job import arbitrary DACL write\par Author: Olaf Hartong. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Windows 10 Scheduled Task SandboxEscaper 0-day
query: (process.executable:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line:*\/change* AND process.command_line:*\/TN* AND process.command_line:*\/RU* AND process.command_line:*\/RP*)
